abstract: The vendor ID for the device.
overview:
## Discussion

The vendor ID designates the vendor that produced the device. It can be combined with [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDVirtualDevice/Properties/productID] to determine the exact device.

More information about vendor IDs can be found online. The vendor ID associated with a HID device is typically a [https://www.usb.org/developers], but can be something else, such as a [https://www.bluetooth.com/specifications/assigned-numbers/].

# vendorID

**Instance Property**

The vendor ID for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
let vendorID: UInt32
```

## Discussion

The vendor ID designates the vendor that produced the device. It can be combined with [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDVirtualDevice/Properties/productID] to determine the exact device.

More information about vendor IDs can be found online. The vendor ID associated with a HID device is typically a [https://www.usb.org/developers], but can be something else, such as a [https://www.bluetooth.com/specifications/assigned-numbers/].
title: vendorID
